channel.title: Best Antivirus?
channel.description:
Tell me what you think the best Antivirus Program is: My personal favorite: RISING ANTIVIRUS: [img]http://cdn.geckoandfly.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/02/rising_free_antivirus_download_crack__serial_firewall_2009.jpg[/img] [url=http://download.cnet.com/Rising-Antivirus-2011/3000-2239_4-10430310.html]http://download.cnet.com/Rising-Antivirus-2011/3000-2239_4-10430310.html[/url] This Is truly the best antivirus i have used By far. Ratings, well how did i test it? I had this keylogger (i believe it was some kind of runescape member Gen(awhile ago)) it could reveal my passwords saved upon Firefox and It oftens opens Gay websites Like literally gay ones.
I installed Many different antivirus's norton... avg, none could solve my problem. Rising did it in 7 minutes. People should try beijing's Rising antivirus. it is truly powerful.
So... Whats your Favorite antivirus?

Kaspersky is my favorite
[/quote]what is the fail percentile for kaspersky? I have heard some good things about them but never tested. Also, what special features do the business/enterprise level ones contain?

I got kaspersky lab, basically it’s my favourite for serveral reasons, the main one is that it blocks out ddosers.
[/quote]will have to take a look thanks



[/quote]how many attacks can it stand at once?[/quote]

so far I’ve seen it take down 5-6 attacks at once.

item.title: Best Antivirus?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JavaTC, post:6, topic:425835”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=528492.msg3854411#msg3854411 date=1324247786]
I used to use Mcafee8.5i (spelling probably wrong lol) and I still got keylogged/ratted like crazy …somebody suggested I go do a boot scan with avast…never turned back.
[/quote]
Mcafee is a fucking piece of shit, I think it’s detection to missed rate is like 1:500
Avast is alright, wouldn’t recommend it though.[/quote]heh, I agree with the Mcafee now really…it’s really infuriating if anything. Mcafee 8.5i a LEGIT version is not cheap in no sense at all. It has good protection but overall…it doesn’t cactch enough even with maximum protection set up.

I just normally run everything in the Avast sandbox.

Read full topic
